channel.title: React native on Yet another software engineer
channel.description: Recent content in React native on Yet another software engineer

item.title: React native file system new file is not visible in computer via USB/MTP
item.description: Newly created file is not visible in computer via USB/MTP in android device. Solution is to use MediaScanner.

item.title: React Native SMTP. Send Email in Background (Android Only)
item.description: React native SMTP is a SMTP client for react-native. It can be used to send emails in the background using the SMTP protocol. This module only supports Android.
